com.jasonc.jpcap

Class WinRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jasonc.jpcap.WinRegistry

  • public class WinRegistry
extends Object
    Pure Java code for reading the Windows' registry, taken from http://stackoverflow.com/a/6163701/616460. This is a hack and may not work forever. Original author is unknown. The only modification I have made is to change the package name.
    Author:
    Unknown
